page.title: 03Kirdford Junior School.
page.content: Kirdford School was built by Wormans in 1968 and it was finished in 1969.It was offically opened by Mrs.K.Murphy on the 17th July 1969. She is one of our governors.Mr Pratt is the headmaster. At the moment there are 68 pupils going to Kirdford School who are split into 3 classes.The age range of the children is 8-11. The children are bussed in from the villages of Ifold, Plaistow and Durfold Wood. English, Maths, French, Art, Music, Project work and PE are the main lessons.In the grounds there is a pond and swimming pool. The school day starts at 8.45am and finishes at 3.20 with a 65 minute break at lunch time.
